name: Ancient Courtyard
title: Ancient Courtyard
desc: "Is mortal life not an empty shell, as unto a dream?"

skills.desc: You must have a character who has already equipped a Weapon or Artifact: The next time you play a Weapon or Artifact card in this Round: Spend 2 less Elemental Dice. (Only one "Arcane Legend" card can be played for the entire game. This card will be in your starting hand.)
